Plot: Is Charley crazy, delusional or dead? Follow her amazing, emotional journey and emerge into the battle with her nemesis – herself. This inspirational fantasy will take you into realms otherwise unknown, turning your world upside down while you’ll be wondering what is real and what is not. It’s an adventure, a mystery and an imaginative fairytale for adults. Gone was a story motivated by a true event. *** Cover Design: Julie Elizabeth Powell Source Photo: Angel Feather Wing by taeya18 (Free Digital Photos)
Characters: Charley (Gone), Jenny, Ezrin (Avalon Trilogy), Chamber (Gone), Brogan, Pherson (Gone), Ner'do (Gone), Fun & Games
Setting: Avalon: The Star Realm, The Dark Reaches, Dominion Of Ice
